website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking model that comes with its flaws. Good choice if design and size of the unit must be considered.
pros: Instructions and customer service are terrific
Low profile design looks good and allows for easy storage
cons: Lack of sensitivity is an issue - weights fluctuate considerably
Button underneath scale changes units of measure

customer_reviews.title: It works... but...
customer_reviews.text: It works... but... prepare to be disappointed at the lack of stability. The buttons almost sense when your finger is close and upon the slightest touch, the numbers on the scale fluctuate wildly. To have any confidence in the actual weight I have the urge to re-measure everything more than twice. When resetting the weight (of say a bowl), it's difficult to know if your finger changed the weight that was measured or not. The unfortunate placement of the unit selector is also a major detraction. If you're completely broke and need something that'll get you close - this one is for you. If you want accuracy and confidence in what you're measuring, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cauthen

customer_reviews.title: weird
customer_reviews.text: So i've had this scale about a month maybe two. It was heaven AT FIRST!! Did everything as described. Well today while meal prepping it started freaking out on me. The number kept fluctuating even when nothing was on the scale or even after taring out. I've noticed within the last week there was a slight glitch here and there but I thought it was just me due to rushing in the mornings. Only reason im giving two stars is.because after turning it off for for a couple mins it was fine again. Im not sure how much longer i'll be able to use it if it keeps acting up on me, especially in the middle of meal prepping.
customer_reviews.author: Esquilita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produt
customer_reviews.text: Great scale even if it would have cost more. Looks nice hanging on the wall, out of the way. Works in several modes and can determine volumes by weight. I measured 'about' half a cup of water in a 1 cup measure, put it on the scale after zeroing the cup, and wala, .51 cups. We made pork sausage and instead of gustimating the amount of each chub, we were able to determine exactly 1 lb. pieces. Large numbers to read for us older guys, stainless platform for easy cleaning. This scale is great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: This looks great but it can't do small changes in weight very ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks great but it can't do small changes in weight very well especially in the 0-10 gram range. I used it to try and measure out 5 gram sugar toppings for some items I was baking and out of four different measurements one registered at 3 grams and the other 3 didn't even register that anything was on the scale... I do understand that there are going to be some inaccuracies but this should have at least measured something when weight was added. I can't have confidence on what the weight is at ant point.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Value --- Well Designed --- Good Company
customer_reviews.text: The most FANTASTIC value I've seen in kitchen scales. It has ALL the features this cook desires in a scale. It tares well, and has a large flat surface; the entire top half is used for measurement. One very minor concern is unclear battery change instruction, which I will provide --- Remove the #1 Phillips screw at the top of the battery door, and GENTLY PRESS downward with coin or fingernail toward where the screw was, and pull to release. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND "DecoBros Direct" (and I RARELY give endorsements); just email them with any questions for great service.
customer_reviews.author: BSchauerte

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, one of the few scales with separate settings for WATER, MILK and DRY GOODS
customer_reviews.text: You can easily toggle this scale between WATER, MILK and DRY GOODS by pressing the MODE button on the left and cycling through the settings (this is in addition to the switch on the bottom of the scale that toggles between English and Metric units). It's also CONTINUALLY measures liquid weight when you pour, so you don't have the scale jumping all over the place as you try to reach an exact measure of liquid or dry goods. Wish it had a backlight, but it's not really necessary in a kitchen environment. I really love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: WolfX5

customer_reviews.title: This unit has the best features for the money that I could find
customer_reviews.text: This unit has the best features for the money that I could find, and it looks good in our stainless theme kitchen. I was tempted to take away one star due to one of the silicone rubber pads underneath being slightly out of position. This caused the scale to not sit completely flat, and that is not appropriate when you are measuring weight. Anyway, simply applying pressure with my thumb to slide the pad into the proper position resolved this singular issue. Because it was so easy and quick to remedy, I will let it keep its 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Can't use for pour-over coffee, shuts off and zeros automatically.
customer_reviews.text: This scale automatically shuts off during use, and then automatically zeros when turned back on. This makes it useless for processes which require multiple steps/additions to the payload. I purchased it to make pour-over coffee, but it is impossible to use it for that, since turns off and zeros after every step. It is only useful for weighing things one at a time - but make sure you watch and remember the number on the display because it will quickly shut off! It is also very difficult to change units, there is a very small switch underneath the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: which is nice, but I got to use it for one ...
customer_reviews.text: Scale is slim and lightweight, which is nice, but I got to use it for one day before the battery indicator said LO and I'm getting this CAL error (I guess Calibration needed?) that isn't listed in the guide or anywhere I can find online. Now I need to purchase a battery that's supposed to last quite a while, it's not an easy battery to replace like a AAA, and I shouldn't have to since I just got it a few days ago. The manual leaves much to be desired with non-existent troubleshooting assistance and no where for me to get further information or FAQs. Save yourself the trouble, spend $5 more dollars and get a better scale.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Super little scale
customer_reviews.text: An excellent little scale at a good price. Works exactly as you would expect and it is easy to understand and use right out of the box. I found the instructions clear and easy to follow. Scale is very accurate vs other scales I've used. I wish it had a quicker auto-off feature as 2 min is a long time but you can turn it off manually and that is a very minor inconvenience. Small enough to be unobtrusive on the counter yet can handle any weighing needs in an average kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Will serve it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend because I also have a kitchen scale (not this brand/model - mine isn't sold any longer) and love it. Mine came with a small binder chart showing different categories (flours, sugars, fats, liquids, etc...) and conversion measurements (ie. 1 cup of all purpose flour = 5oz). This one didn't so I was disappointed about that. I told my friend I would make a copy of my binder so she had a reference when following non-metric recipes.
customer_reviews.author: CRL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up over time.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great scale for about 7 months. Then one day it just wouldn’t work. Replaced the battery and still didn’t work. Tried again Incase it was a faulty battery and Still no.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for around 3 years. Although i ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for around 3 years. Although i dont wish to do so, but I think its time for me to get another one. It started stalling me alot while meal prepping!! It takes about 2 minutes to reset when i first turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: abdullah

customer_reviews.title: but not in a bad way. Sure it's plasticey
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to read any negative feed back on this product, but I guess you just can't please everybody. This scale is exactly what you'd expect for the price, but not in a bad way. Sure it's plasticey, but what did you expect? I have no complaints at all about this scale. I use it in soap making and have never had a bad batch. Deco Bros take the time to E-Mail you instructions that you should be able to figure out on your own about changing to metric...hint, it's the switch on the bottom...now you know.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore DiMisa

customer_reviews.title: Does what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Useflu small kitchen scale. Quick and accurate for measurements before, during, and after cooking. Only thing i'd like is for it to be a bit bigger, but for 90% of applications its pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: iknowiknow

customer_reviews.title: No tenths of a gram...  but perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: works good, seems accurate. I think I thought it might weigh lighter stuff .. It goes to grams which is good for most people. I was weighting stuff for drones and I guess I thought It would go to tenths. But works great... ah hell, I'll give her 5.
customer_reviews.author: Thad

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Etsy shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I opened my Etsy shop to help me figure out shipping costs. I love it's slim design and doesn't take up much room AND that it automatically shuts off when I forget to turn it off. I like the platform size, because if it were smaller I wouldn't be able to balance big boxes on it and still see the read-out. If this ever dies I'll be thinking about that issue for a future scale.
customer_reviews.author: WashingtonState

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read display, pre-installed battery, and compact design make this a great kitchen scale.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read display, pre-installed battery, and compact design make this a great kitchen scale. I would not use it for science but it seems to be consistent so very effective in the kitchen. UPDATE: It's nearly impossible to clean food that falls between the silver plastic platform and the black plastic frame and that's kind of annoying but it does not affect the performance in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Move on
customer_reviews.text: The settings took me a bit to figure out. When it was time to replace the battery I could never get it to sit flat. So I can not get the panel to close properly. Now it sits in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: rick lesser

customer_reviews.title: Vital Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Essential for every kitchen, this little guy has allowed us to lose weight and have a healthy pup. We use it to measure our and our dog’s food everyday to get an accurate measurement of calories consumed daily. This scale is accurate, sturdy and reasonably priced. The only thing I would change on the design is putting the unit change button on top. This button is currently on the bottom of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: OK, but flawed
customer_reviews.text: Average quality, does the job, easy to switch from Grand to ounces BUT when you hit tare (to get to zero) the weight of your finger is registered k since the buttons are connected to the scale portion of the unit), so it's tricky to get it to zero. Don't recommend, would look for another unit that clearly has the buttons independent of the scale.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, fast shipping and very responsive seller. The scale arrived quickly and works just as promised. It has been perfect for weighing food, mail for postage, and foster kittens, and has proven to be accurate every time. At half the price of anything I found in stores, I would definitely recommend it if you are looking for a small, compact scale that works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Wells

customer_reviews.title: hate the button to switch modes being on the underside.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that this scale has the button to switch modes from ounces to grams on the back side. Makes it very inconvenient if you want to switch modes quickly when cooking or baking. Also it is quite a bit large in size then my old scale and I am not so fond of that either. The scale seems to weigh accurately and the price was good but I will be looking for another scale where the ability to switch modes is not underneath.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mason

customer_reviews.title: I love this scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. The fact that it is square is most helpful because I can easily place square Tupperware on it to measure out lunches. It is also sleek and easy to clean. It zeroes easily and stays on long enough for you to use it for multiple items when making meals in advance. I had a circular one in the past that stopped working on me and I replaced it with this. I'll never have another circular one again. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Azcz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight, slim kitchen scale. I use it for measuring portions and also for mailing. After a month of use it works perfectly, and I find it to be accurate and sensitive. You can measure weight or volume, and also change units from metric to imperial depending on what you need. It has a tare function so you can weigh foods in dishes or add ingredients one at a time by weight. Awesome if you are dieting and measuring out portions on a plate one at a time. Also, it looks nice. No problems at all. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Super Jelly Doughnut

customer_reviews.title: This is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price. I am on weight watchers, so I weigh food all day long. It stores easily in a drawer, you can "zero" out the container by placing it on the sale then turning it on. Then add your food. Easy. I also love the feature that you can press the button on the bottom to convert to grams. Makes splitting into portions easier sometimes. I have been using this for months with no issues. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this to measure haircolor but is off my up to 3 grams. I need something to measure less than 1 gram and be extremely accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Paige K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great gift
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased three of these. Two as gifts for culinary students. Nice and lightweight- easy to handle. Doesn’t take up space on the counter as it slides into a cabinet. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Super Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen scale
customer_reviews.text: Just about perfect. I use if for a kitchen scale -- weighing out the ingredients when baking gives you better results. Also use it to weigh coffee for the French Press. Only tricky thing is the switch for switching from Oz to Gm is hidden on the bottom, and this is not obvious from the manual. But once you figure that out, you never need to figure it out again
customer_reviews.author: Pat deMills

customer_reviews.title: The price is great and pictures looked great
customer_reviews.text: The price is great and pictures looked great, before purchasing it I did some research and found this exactly what I needed, when I got it everything was simple to use, it comes with a battery and I use it to weigh small packages and my wife uses it to weigh hair product color or toners, she asnt complained, its very easy to use and easy to put away in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Neto Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to wiegh my packages so I use the correct postage. I am able to save money and time by having this tool and I got it at a great price! I was also notified by the company before receiving my product that there was a buttonmon the scale I would need to use to change the units. This was very informative and appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna C.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: now that amazon told me where the lbs to grams button is (on the bottom) ... it does not convert easily... but it works for my general purposes of cooking, & food storage prep (I buy in bulk & break meat & veggies down to smaller sizes). **UPDATE** I am still using this scale in 10/2019 and it is easy to use (except the mentioned above). I am now on a diet that I often have to measure my food. This does a reasonable job.
customer_reviews.author: Kiristie Flores

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I love this scale
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I love this scale! It is super simple to use, very user friendly and gets the job done. I like how sleek and slim it looks while not looking "cheap". It came very nicely packaged with great instructions. Have no complaints. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Velsabet M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there is a gram button on the back... But you need some weight on it before it will read only a gram or two. You cannot tare it once the additional weight is added, thus forcing you to not only diet but do math as well. Terrible. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Good scale
customer_reviews.text: Great scale. Accurate, I use it to measure everything I eat. The only annoying thing is that the button to switch from g->oz is under the scale. Also if you wait too long while putting things on the scale, it turns off. Bu that doesn't happen often for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rabab Alrayes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs ....
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit flustered at first trying to figure out settings. The scale is a little touchy. The good news is that once we became friends (lol) it was just what I needed. Love that it is slim and easy to clean. Very nice looking scale.
customer_reviews.author: sandrade99

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This is the clearest, easiest food scale I've ever used. It's accurate (I've tested in comparison with some calibrated ones), easy to use, and the digital readout is so great to have. The design is sleek and fits in the kitchen well - I definitely would recommend this scale to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Working Well in Science Classroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for measuring salt mix for saltwater aquarium. Also used in science labs. Easy to zero out (tare) and select units.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H.

customer_reviews.title: Good - but not options to weigh in Grams.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good scale, but for some reason it doesn't weigh in grams. I was on the Keto diet and I used this scale for accurate food measurements. Most american packaging has their information in Grams while this scale only measures in pounds and ounces, for both liquid and solid food.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for simplicity, easy to use & store plus inexpensive, this is your baby. Yes, it's sensitive - but it's accurate. The price is so worth it! I like that it calibrates itself when you set a container on the scale before you turn it on. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: April-MN

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it has one flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Have not checked the accuracy on this product but it seems to be close enough for my food consumption. Positive is the ease in cleaning and storing. It thin and cleans up with ease. Negative is the buttons are very sensitive to the touch. When I put my bowl or what ever on it and go to zero it it works fine. When I go to zero it back to original zero my finger pressure is recognized.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Does Weight...what else to say?
customer_reviews.text: Scale is easy enough to use with an "zero-out" ability so just dump a plate and zero out and then weight whatever you want. Works great with a nice big surface. Not much else really, can do metric and so can everything else I'm sure. Good enough for the home cook who needs to weight things occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: ID 10 T Error

customer_reviews.title: Good scale for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good scale with some issues since I got it. I made one trip with it and when I took it out of my bag the rubber pegs on the bottom came off and were in different places. I have a feeling they will be lost soon and it may end up being inaccurate for weight. I like the options of weighing different things but do not like to have to pick it up to reach a button on the bottom to change the units.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN C WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Good scale but not sure if weighs right
customer_reviews.text: Good scale just feels a little flimsy, like I might break it. If you're really hard on things this might not be the one for you, but it's a good easy to use scale! The only thing I feel is wrong with the scale is that it doesn't weigh right because I put an unopened bread loaf that weighs 680g and on the scale it says it's 463g, so I'm not sure if the battery is dying or if it's not very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Solomon R.

customer_reviews.title: I don't think so - this one usually has some pretty unusual readings
customer_reviews.text: So, this never really worked. it feels very flimsy and not well made. I have another scale and was hoping to take this one to work so I could measure my food and appropriately log it, but it never matched what my other scale measured. I know, I know, what if my other scale is wrong? I don't think so - this one usually has some pretty unusual readings. I seriously just threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Save money with accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The only way to measure xpensive two part epoxies accurately. I needed accurate mix ratios for different marine epoxy applications and this was the best way. Very accurate scale indeed. There have been ZERO FAILED BATCHES since I bought this scale which is a good thing because marine epoxy is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: LAR

customer_reviews.title: Gone bizerk.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a short period of time then completely malfunctioned. It won't zero out, numbers flashing uncontrollably with nothing on the scale. Can't find the instruction manual but it seems like it's just not working. Two stars for being totally unpredictable. Now it's working !!! HA add a star.
customer_reviews.author: crescent wrench

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: must have. accurate and compact. I use this daily to make my shakes that require small ML and Gram measurements. You can even use it to weigh your herbs. I can thank this scale for my continued weight loss as i can accurately weigh and log meals on my fitness pal without selling my self short. If you need a kitchen or "you know" scale then this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kaden

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended. Purchased and returned.
customer_reviews.text: I purchaser this scale and too many inconsistencies. The unit change on the bottom. The scale was wobbly. Pressing on the front would change the measurements even if you were trying to tare the unit. Returned the unit and only received about $3 back. I purchased a different unit and much happier.
customer_reviews.author: I. Lo

customer_reviews.title: And it looks great hanging next to my knife rack
customer_reviews.text: I chose this scale because it can be hung on the wall. Very Convenient! And it looks great hanging next to my knife rack. I also like the stainless steel because I can put food directly on it then wipe it clean. The 'Zero' feature allows me to put a plate on the scale, reset to zero, add a food and reset to zero again to add another food. This scale is accurate if it is placed on a solid, level surface. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wyldemoon

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the fact that I can hang it up on ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and worth the money if you need a scale. I especially like the fact that I can hang it up on the inside wall of my kitchen cabinet because it has hanging hole on the back of it
customer_reviews.author: Mike DeLaurenzo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Postage and Food Scale
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scale. I use it for both cooking and mail postage. It measures as small as a tenth of a decimal per ounce which is necessary for mail. I have an etsy shop, where I ship items less than 5 pounds and this ensures I'm charging the correct rates for packages. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica (Erica G Designs)

customer_reviews.title: The scale arrived on time and was intact. They ...
customer_reviews.text: The scale arrived on time and was intact. They now have included a card about changing from grams to ounces and a plea to call the company first before returning the product. I have only used it once and all seemed ok. I do agree about the scale tipping forward when pushing the zero button so be sure it is away from the edge of the counter.
customer_reviews.author: bcrow

customer_reviews.title: ... I would have hoped but it has been working great. My only annoyance is when you press the ...
customer_reviews.text: The scale is a bit smaller than I would have hoped but it has been working great. My only annoyance is when you press the front buttons (like to wake it up) the whole scale tips forward. I wish the bumpers underneath were a bit further forward to prevent this. Again, just an annoyance but it works otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: A good value in a scale for most kitchens
customer_reviews.text: Practical and really useful. Flexible with tare (I like using that feature) and metric as an option for those either accustomed to it or using recipes calling for that type of measurement. The device works properly, is well priced and seems to be up to the tasks for which it is needed. It appears to be sufficiently durable too.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little scale. I bought it for when I go to the warehouse club and buy bulk meats. I place a piece of clear cling wrap on the scale, and put the meat on and get a perfect reading. No more guessing, which I found I did badly! Lol. It's compact size makes it easy to store. DecoBros sent me an email before I received the scale explaining how to switch from lbs to grams, if needed. I call that great customer service! I would recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette L.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Recently threw this away. Was garbage from day one. Received with a dead battery which wasn't a big deal until I found that you can't even get the battery out to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: C Yeari

customer_reviews.title: The scale it self works fine. I got it to keep track of my ...
customer_reviews.text: The scale it self works fine. I got it to keep track of my guinea pigs weight and when they move even the smallest amount the scale changes so much. So I guess I'll have to use it for something else.it works well if your not gonna use it for anything that's gonna move what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has
customer_reviews.text: Im kinda a coffee geek. I use it to weigh coffee beans before I put them in the grinder. Tough to get it "just right" one cup at a time without some precision. Love that it has TARE
customer_reviews.author: Rockfish

customer_reviews.title: Good basic scale
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few weeks and given it a test run, mostly to weigh out craft supplies and wool I've spun into yarn. The scale is nothing fancy, but seems accurate, weighs items in either ounces or grams (very helpful), and is easy to read. I can store it in a small space (also very helpful), and was a good price. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderdul. I had great communication from the company the whole time. It was easy to use and had many extra features that came in handy! I'm tempted to buy another one... One for food... One for craft items. It's easy to use and very clear to understand. I have no doubt that this will last me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: HANNNNIE

customer_reviews.title: Bought This For Diet, Still Using It Today!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for helping me with portioning my meals while I was on the hCG diet. The scale has a nice, wide surface and gave accurate readings. It was easy to use and clean. For meats, I would simply put a piece of saran wrap on the scale, zero it out, and then place the meats on top. I was torn between buying the DecoBros scale and the Etekcity Volume Supported Food Scale but obviously I ultimately ended up buying this scale because of its sleek and easy-to-store design. I highly recommend this scale to anyone who is trying to portion their meals and doesn't want to spend a fortune on a scale!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Scale! Easy to use and large enough to place a plate or bowl onto.
customer_reviews.author: FlyRick

customer_reviews.title: great kitchen scale
customer_reviews.text: great kitchen scale, i use this to weigh my dogs food 3 times a day, it is so easy to use, i simply zero out the scale and add everything weigh. it is fast, light weight, and had a large digital screen that is easy to see and read. you can also quickly change whatever form our measurement you need as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. It is very important that the product is of the right weight. So I brought it in and found most of the stuff weighed on our old scale was 1/2 to 3/4 of an ounce off. That is a lot of wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sleek Look
customer_reviews.text: I can't really review much because I've just used it a few days.Arrived in perfect shape, works as intended and has multiple choices of viewing the weight, including a little switch on the bottom for choosing metric or US.
customer_reviews.author: RobRoaster

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it for scientific purposes but it's fine for weighing out the wet cat food and other sundry kitchen tasks. It doesn't always seem to weigh consistently for the same thing placed upon it....just a little off sometimes....but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and looks very nice! My only complaint is that the 2 of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and looks very nice! My only complaint is that the 2 of the rubber feet were not on the scale making it tip. I took off all of the feet and it does slide around on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and matches with my other scale. The entire top housing is the scale, so pushing the on/off button presses down on the scale, which I didn't expect, but it works fine nonetheless. Note: a button on the back changes the units on the display.
customer_reviews.author: this_guy

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It works well and I am happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It works well and I am happy to finally have a kitchen scale again. When I ordered it the company sent me an email to clarify where to change the weight from pounds to grams which was very nice of them but it is also very clear in the directions. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stardusting

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thin while being accurate
customer_reviews.text: Did this for my diet. Wife did not think this was necessary but I think she will come around after a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: dcwuellner

customer_reviews.title: Scale is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This product is simple to use and very accurate for my purposes. I'm weighing everything that goes into my backpack to keep it as light as possible. I have weighed items that I know the weight, and the scale is right on. I love that I can zero out the scale with the push of a button. I'm weighing in ounces.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Digital Multifunctional Lightweight DecoBros Scale
customer_reviews.text: The DecoBros scale works well and it is easy to get results in 10ths of an ounce up to 11 pounds or in grams up to 5 kilograms. It also does fluid oz and ml. The scale can be zeroed to cancel out the weight of the container. It requires a small 3V lithium battery. It is light weight, compact and has an attractive appearance. I have had this scale for two months.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS DU BROY

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect. I love the sleek design
customer_reviews.text: It took some getting used to, but now that I understand how it works, it is perfect. I love the sleek design. It tucks neatly away and doesn't take up much space and is attractive when it's on the kitchen counter. It seems to be accurate and doing it's job!
customer_reviews.author: Zannah

customer_reviews.title: Well at first i had doubts, because it seemed ...
customer_reviews.text: Well at first i had doubts, because it seemed a bit touchy. But as time went on found it trustworthy. The price is right, the way my Mrs. finds ways to kill them.
customer_reviews.author: coolchip

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. Arrived promptly, works well, lightweight, ultra-thin, easy to store in small spaces, easy to read (and I have serious eye problems), easy to clean and very accurate. Also reasonably priced. What more can you ask from a food scale? I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mai

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I used it twice and now it won't even turn on. Sounds like something is rattling around inside. And of course I threw away the box so I can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M

customer_reviews.title: Great scale with one downside
customer_reviews.text: This scale does a great job. It's easy to use and accurate. Batteries are included. The biggest downside is that when you push the buttons it tips forward.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME small scale for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: great small scale for the kitchen! easy to use and light weight! I weigh my dogs raw food, so I simply put his bowl on top then zero out the scale and I am ready to go! There is a button on the back of the scale to switch to metric, its easy to find and press if needed.
customer_reviews.author: JFG

customer_reviews.title: Right price with some quirks
customer_reviews.text: This scale is the perfect size and has all the features I want at the right price. The only reason I don't feel comfortable giving a 5 star rating is due to the scale resetting itself while it's in use. I currently use it to make coffee in a chemex, and and I am trying to weigh the amount of water going into it. Almost every time I do this it will shut off and restart. At this point it zeros out the scale and I'm losing how much water I've actually used.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The scale seems to work fine, but I hate that you have to turn over the scale to change the units. I frequently switch from ounces to grams because not all nutrition facts on food labels are consistent. It's a petty complaint, but it's annoying when you're constantly having to flip it over and change the units. Why isn't that button on top?
customer_reviews.author: Katie RO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product to which my did before meal preparation. I am truly grateful I purchased this scale! It keeps my portion in check for any meal! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Warixewei

customer_reviews.title: Neat and handy scale.
customer_reviews.text: Neat little machine for checking portion sizes in ounces or grams. I got this a an assist for Weight Watchers and find it very handy. I keep mine on the counter beside the fridge, but has a hook space for making it a wall hanger.
customer_reviews.author: HL White

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a scale that wasn't bulky but still provided good quality and accurate measurements, this one goes beyond your expectations, it does exactly it it says it does and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: SGT Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Being a new diabetic with poor eyesight I like the large buttons and numbers
customer_reviews.text: This is my first scale. Being a new diabetic with poor eyesight I like the large buttons and numbers, easy to read. The ease of moving between ounce and grams is a plus. It is light weight and hanges on the wall for storage. Easy clean. I recommend this scale to anyone who is in need of a small scale!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pierce

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. So far have used it every day and really like it. The only problem I have with it (and the reason for 4 stars) is that when I put a dinner plate on it, I can't read the display. Maybe in the long run, it will be fine and force me to use smaller plates, but right now it's just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Esther M

customer_reviews.title: Our teapot weighs...
customer_reviews.text: We weighed everything in our kitchen because it was fun. Works well. The company even sent me a proactive email to thoroughly explain how to change the unit of measurement after feedback that it was unclear. A great touch!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Works good at first... then not
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Scale worked great at first, then started eating batteries. I’m going through about 2 a month which is absurd. And my g/oz button only works occasionally. Wish I had spent a few bucks more to get a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kj2110

customer_reviews.title: Accurate kitchen scale.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my bride as she is transitioning into gluten free flours which often recipes are measured by weight instead of volume. Like the large display and easy to use functions, not to mention the reasonable price, fast shipping and accurate display.
customer_reviews.author: Deerail

customer_reviews.title: Price is right!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine and the price is right! My only complaint is that there is no shut off button. It is an auto off function. I wonder if I will end up changing the battery often. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale
customer_reviews.text: Nice scale, good quality. I like that there is a nail hole in the back so I can hang in kitchen out of the way, but easily accessible. Plus cheaper price than walmart!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Get Real Potion Control
customer_reviews.text: One of the most light weight scales I have ever bought in my lifetime. It reads in Pounds, Ounces, and meters of products such as food, liquids, Boxes, Letters etc. I find it extremely accurate its measurements, completely exact. I measure a package for shipping and put on the correct number of stamps, take it to USPS at no extra cost. I LOVE my DecoBros Digital multifunction scale. Lauxioniamune
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is as good and simple of a balance as you can get
customer_reviews.text: This is as good and simple of a balance as you can get. It gets the job done in both English and Metric systems, can weight solids, liquids and milk. It is reliable and energy efficient. I am a culinary arts student and can not recommend this item enough.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: DeccoBros makes a good digital scale
customer_reviews.text: Scale is very accurate down to the 1/10 of an ounce and can be switched to metric for grams. Using it to measure meat for our latest diet program. It's easy to use, unobtrusive and works great. we like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie N. Benzominer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this scale all the time and have never had a problem. Absolutely worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very small and lightweight, so I don't know how long it will last, but works well and does the job I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: It is very accurate and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my soap making. It is very accurate and very easy to use .. Am very pleased. Will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason!
customer_reviews.text: Great until it wasn't. It measured well and zeroed easily but a very slight bump in the kitchen and it won't power on. The battery is in correctly and there is no sign of damage. It's cheap for a reason...the slightest thing will finish it. (And I can't return it 😡).
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Compact and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love this little scale! I generally use it for weighing small packages and envelopes for shipping. It does a great job, is compact, easy to store and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysha

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty accurate for box weight. I shipped out a few dvds and weighed it and it told me 12.1 ounces, went to post office and used the APC priority mail and weight came out to exactly the same! For me that is more than enough to purchase for 15 pound and under shipments
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chipman

product_meta.title: DecoBros Digital Multifunction Kitchen and Food Scale, 11lb Capacity by 0.1oz, Stainless Platform, Elegant Black
product_meta.description: DecoBros high quality kitchen scale provide multiple indicator of weight or volume of water and milk. The scale also has two weight unit system g, lb:oz. Enjoy DecoBros products to make your life simple and elegant.
feature_bullets: Precise to 0.1oz and accurate digital kitchen scale with Zero and Tare function
Capable indicate volume of water and milk (Please check manual for detail)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,181 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
